post.summary: Initialize a new Attachment to be shared in correspondences
post.description:
One of the scopes: 

- altinn:correspondence.write 

Only required if the attachment is to be shared, otherwise this is done as part of the Initialize Correspondence operation

400.description:
• Resource type is not supported. Resource must be of type GenericAccessResource or CorrespondenceService.
  • Could not retrieve party uuid from lookup in Altinn Register
  • Filename is missing
  • Filename is too long
  • Filename contains invalid characters
  • Filetype not allowed

401.description: You must use an Altinn token, DialogToken or log in to IDPorten as someone with access to the resource and orgaization in Altinn Authorization

post.summary: Upload attachment data to Altinn Correspondence blob storage

400.description:
• File must have content and has a max file size of 250 MB
  • File has already been or is being uploaded
  • Cannot upload attachment to a correspondence that has been created
  • Could not retrieve party uuid from lookup in Altinn Register
  • Could not get data location url
  • Checksum mismatch

401.description: You must use an Altinn token, DialogToken or log in to IDPorten as someone with access to the resource and orgaization in Altinn Authorization

404.description: The requested attachment was not found

get.summary: Get information about the attachment and its current status

401.description: You must use an Altinn token, DialogToken or log in to IDPorten as someone with access to the resource and orgaization in Altinn Authorization

404.description: The requested attachment was not found

• File has already been purged
  • Attachment cannot be purged as it is linked to at least one existing correspondence

404.description: The requested attachment was not found

post.description:
One of the scopes: 
/>
- altinn:correspondence.write 

Requires uploads of specified attachments if any before it can be Published

200.description: Returns metadata about the initialized correspondence

400.description:
• Resource type is not supported. Resource must be of type GenericAccessResource or CorrespondenceService
  • Could not retrieve party uuid from lookup in Altinn Register
  • Recipients must be unique
  • DueDateTime is required when confirmation is needed
  • DueDateTime cannot be prior to today
  • DueDateTime cannot be prior to RequestedPublishTime
  • AllowSystemDelete cannot be prior to today
  • AllowSystemDelete cannot be prior to RequestedPublishTime
  • The Content field must be provided for the correspondence
  • Message title cannot be empty
  • Message title must be plain text
  • Message body cannot be empty
  • Message body must be markdown
  • Message summary cannot be empty
  • Message summary must be markdown
  • Invalid language chosen. Supported languages is Norsk bokmål (nb), Nynorsk (nn) and English (en)
  • Recipient overrides with email or mobile number are not allowed when using notification recipient name because of name lookup
  • Could not find recipient with id: {id} to override
  • No recipients provided for one or more recipient overrides
  • Missing email information for custom recipient. Add email or use the OrganizationNumber or NationalIdentityNumber fields for contact information
  • Missing mobile number for custom recipient. Add mobile number or use the OrganizationNumber or NationalIdentityNumber fields for contact information
  • Organization number cannot be combined with email address, mobile number, or national identity number
  • National identity number cannot be combined with email address, mobile number, or organization number.
  • Invalid email provided for custom recipient
  • Invalid mobile number provided. Mobile number can contain only '+' and numeric characters, and it must adhere to the E.164 standard
  • Mismatch between uploaded files and attachment metadata
  • File must have content and has a max file size of 250 MB
  • The sender of the correspondence must be equal the sender of existing attachments
  • Existing attachment not found
  • Attachment is not published

401.description: You must use an Altinn token, DialogToken or log in to IDPorten as someone with access to the resource and orgaization in Altinn Authorization

403.description: Resource not whitelisted. Contact us on Slack or servicedesk@altinn.no

404.description:
• Could not find partyId for the following recipients: {recipients}
  • The requested notification template with the given language was not found

422.description: Recipient {recipientId} has reserved themselves from public correspondences. Can be overridden using the 'IgnoreReservation' flag

get.summary: Gets a list of Correspondences for the authenticated user
get.description:
One of the scopes: 

- altinn:correspondence.read 

- altinn:correspondence.write 

Meant for Receivers, but also available for Senders to track Correspondences

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Represents the important statuses for an Correspondence

400.description:
• Could not retrieve party uuid from lookup in Altinn Register
  • From date cannot be after to date

401.description:
• You must use an Altinn token, DialogToken or log in to IDPorten as someone with access to the resource and orgaization in Altinn Authorization
  • Could not determine the caller

post.summary: Initialize Correspondences and uploads attachments in the same request

Correspondence.ResourceId.description: The Resource Id associated with the correspondence service.

Correspondence.Sender.description: The Sending organization of the correspondence.

Correspondence.SendersReference.description: A reference used by senders and receivers to identify a specific Correspondence using external identification methods.

Correspondence.MessageSender.description: An alternative name for the sender of the correspondence. The name will be displayed instead of the organization name.

Correspondence.Content.Language.description: Gets or sets the language of the correspondence, specified according to ISO 639-1

Correspondence.Content.MessageTitle.description: Gets or sets the correspondence message title. Subject.

Correspondence.Content.MessageSummary.description: Gets or sets a summary text of the correspondence.

Correspondence.Content.MessageBody.description: Gets or sets the main body of the correspondence.

Correspondence.Content.Attachments.description: Gets or sets a list of attachments.

Correspondence.RequestedPublishTime.description: When the correspondence should become visible to the recipient.

Correspondence.AllowSystemDeleteAfter.description: When Altinn can remove the correspondence from its database.

Correspondence.DueDateTime.description: When the recipient must reply to the correspondence

Correspondence.ExternalReferences.description:
A list of references Senders can use to tell the recipient that the correspondence is related to the referenced item(s)
Examples include Altinn App instances, Altinn Broker File Transfers

Correspondence.PropertyList.description: User-defined properties related to the Correspondence

Correspondence.ReplyOptions.description: Options for how the recipient can reply to the Correspondence

Correspondence.Notification.EmailSubject.description: The emails subject for the main notification

Correspondence.Notification.EmailBody.description: The email body for the main notification

Correspondence.Notification.SmsBody.description: The sms body for the main notification

Correspondence.Notification.SendReminder.description: Should a reminder be sent if the notification is not confirmed or opened

Correspondence.Notification.ReminderEmai.description: The email subject to use for the reminder notification
The email body to use for the reminder notification

Correspondence.Notification.ReminderSmsB.description: The sms body to use for the reminder notification

Correspondence.Notification.RequestedSen.description: The date and time for when the notification should be sent.

Correspondence.Notification.CustomRecipi.description: the email address of the recipient
the organization number of the recipient
Boolean indicating if the recipient is reserved

Correspondence.Notification.CustomNotifi.description: Only the first list of recipients will be used. If not set, the notification will be sent to the recipient of the Correspondence

Correspondence.IgnoreReservation.description: Specifies whether the correspondence can override reservation against digital communication in KRR

Correspondence.Published.description: Is null until the correspondence is published.

Correspondence.IsConfirmationNeeded.description: Specifies whether reading the correspondence needs to be confirmed by the recipient

Recipients.description: List of recipients for the correspondence, either as organization(urn:altinn:organization:identifier-no:ORGNR) or national identity number(urn:altinn:person:identifier-no:SSN)

ExistingAttachments.description: Existing attachments that should be added to the correspondence

IdempotentKey.description: Optional idempotency key to prevent duplicate correspondence creation

200.description: Returns metadata about the initialized correspondence

400.description:
• Resource type is not supported. Resource must be of type GenericAccessResource or CorrespondenceService
  • Could not retrieve party uuid from lookup in Altinn Register
  • Recipients must be unique
  • DueDateTime is required when confirmation is needed
  • DueDateTime cannot be prior to today
  • DueDateTime cannot be prior to RequestedPublishTime
  • AllowSystemDelete cannot be prior to today
  • AllowSystemDelete cannot be prior to RequestedPublishTime
  • The Content field must be provided for the correspondence
  • Message title cannot be empty
  • Message title must be plain text
  • Message body cannot be empty
  • Message body must be markdown
  • Message summary cannot be empty
  • Message summary must be markdown
  • Invalid language chosen. Supported languages is Norsk bokmål (nb), Nynorsk (nn) and English (en)
  • Recipient overrides with email or mobile number are not allowed when using notification recipient name because of name lookup
  • Could not find recipient with id: {id} to override
  • No recipients provided for one or more recipient overrides
  • Missing email information for custom recipient. Add email or use the OrganizationNumber or NationalIdentityNumber fields for contact information
  • Missing mobile number for custom recipient. Add mobile number or use the OrganizationNumber or NationalIdentityNumber fields for contact information
  • Organization number cannot be combined with email address, mobile number, or national identity number
  • National identity number cannot be combined with email address, mobile number, or organization number.
  • Invalid email provided for custom recipient
  • Invalid mobile number provided. Mobile number can contain only '+' and numeric characters, and it must adhere to the E.164 standard
  • Mismatch between uploaded files and attachment metadata
  • File must have content and has a max file size of 250 MB
  • The sender of the correspondence must be equal the sender of existing attachments
  • Existing attachment not found
  • Attachment is not published

get.summary: Get information about the Correspondence and its current status
get.description:
One of the scopes: 

 - altinn:correspondence.read 

 - altinn:correspondence.write 

Mostly for use by recipients and occasional status checks

get.summary: Get more detailed information about the Correspondence and its current status as well as noticiation statuses, if available
get.description:
One of the scopes: 

 - altinn:correspondence.read 

 - altinn:correspondence.write 

Meant for Senders that want a complete overview of the status and history of the Correspondence, but also available for Receivers

One of the scopes: 

- altinn:correspondence.read 

- altinn:correspondence.write 
 (Can only purge before the correspondence is published)

400.description:
• Could not retrieve party uuid from lookup in Altinn Register
  • Could not retrieve highest status for correspondence
  • Correspondence has already been purged
  • Sender cannot delete correspondence that has been published
  • Cannot archive or delete a correspondence which has not been confirmed when confirmation is required
